channel.title: EdgePk release ! pk points, customs, minigames, and more ! by arve!
channel.description:
hello this is my first release so please dont flame.
okay ive used alot of time so yeah here we go :]
things added: perfect point system customs donormini avatarmini pk map edgevil pvp perfect gs stances perfect gs specs perfect dclaw 4x hits fixed alot of bugs added godwars sara gwd bandos gwd armadyl gwd you get pk points by doing slayer tasks cool shops zones new jail system higscores new home cool welcome screen easter event fixxed up slayer and alot more but cant think of any now :P
now for the pics :D ill add more l8r [URL=http://img185.imageshack.us/i/14fullscreen.png/][IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img185/7629/14fullscreen.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img412.imageshack.us/i/13activewindow.png/][IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img412/1538/13activewindow.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img412.imageshack.us/i/13activewindow.png/][IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img412/1538/13activewindow.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img831.imageshack.us/i/10activewindow.png/][IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img831/9708/10activewindow.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img94.imageshack.us/i/9activewindow.png/][IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img94/4559/9activewindow.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img266.imageshack.us/i/8activewindow.png/][IMG=http://a.imageshack.us/img266/9052/8activewindow.png]http://[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img836.imageshack.us/i/6activewindow.png/][IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img836/8476/6activewindow.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img710.imageshack.us/i/7activewindow.png/][IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img710/8778/7activewindow.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img710.imageshack.us/i/7activewindow.png/][IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img710/8778/7activewindow.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img94.imageshack.us/i/9activewindow.png/][IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img94/4559/9activewindow.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img831.imageshack.us/i/10activewindow.png/][IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img831/9708/10activewindow.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img9.imageshack.us/i/11activewindow.png/][IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img9/4442/11activewindow.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img80.imageshack.us/i/12activewindow.png/][IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img80/9816/12activewindow.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img412.imageshack.us/i/13activewindow.png/][IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img412/1538/13activewindow.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img185.imageshack.us/i/14fullscreen.png/][IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img185/7629/14fullscreen.png[/img][/URL]
okay now for the download link :D
its a package http://www.megaupload.com/?d=S8HESYII[code=html4strict][/code]
post if u need mirrors
and pleas dont call me nerd fucker or anything idc. just give me the info on what i can improve on and stuff..
creds : 70 % alex isle for the base 30% me for adding the stuff
hope you like it :] -Arve
